scenario_text.value: Hey, Takuma?

What’s wrong, Agumon?
Your voice sounds really tense.
I’m starting to feel a little uneasy, too...

It’s just...I don’t even know what I’m
supposed to be. No clue.

But somehow I knew that you would appear,
Takuma. I don’t know why, but I did.
...Agumon.

And I don’t just mean that I knew some human
kid would come along, either.

I knew that it was going to be you. That one
day, you and I would meet.

I trusted you would come and waited and
waited. So...do you think you can trust me?

(Poor Agumon... He’s anxious because
everyone else is on edge.)

(I don’t think Agumon would betray me.
Letting him know that should ease his mind.)

(But if I’m gonna tell him, maybe I should
really open up about my emotions...)
(What should I say to Agumon?)
Thanks for waiting.
You’ll evolve well!
I choose who I trust.

You waited this whole time for me?
Thank you, Agumon.
I’m glad we met each other!
Yeah, me, too!
(Agumon looks really happy.)

(It felt awkward,
but I’m glad I said it flat out.)

You can relax.
There’s nothing you need to worry about.

I trust you,
and I’m not gonna let you evolve into anything bad.

Okay! I feel better when you put it
like that. You sound so cool, too!

I d-do?
I’m just glad you feel better...

Even if I don’t understand myself,
with you at my side I feel great!

It’s hard to trust someone who says,
“Trust me.” Minoru makes that pretty clear.
Yeah. I guess you’re right...

Hear me out, Agumon.
Don’t act so bent out of shape.

I trust you. I trust you by my own choice,
without being told to.
Takuma...

No matter what anyone says,
and even if you can’t trust yourself...

I’ll follow my heart to decide whether
I trust you. And that’s that.

I understand. I have to do my best so you can
keep trusting me!

So once everyone’s done resting,
should we go find some enemies?

Yeah, so let’s take our time with exploring
while we rest our minds and bodies.
